resources.string: Lack of necessary permissions, if you want to continue using please confirm
Lack of necessary permissions. Continue to use Confirm and allow permissions in the settings. Otherwise, you will quit the program.

Notes: The running time needs to read, store and modify the files. Lack of necessary permissions will lead to the failure of running, so do not close the necessary permissions.\n Network: If the watch is TicWear, please go to Settings-Privilege Management-FileServer and set the mobile data privilege to "Opened".\n Storage: You need to write and read local content, so please keep storage privileges open in the settings.

Background running:The application supports background running. If it is no longer in use, please manually slide to the right to close the main interface to end the application running to reduce power consumption.

When the watches are not operated for a long time, the application will enter the low-light mode. At this time, it is necessary to click the interface to exit the low-light mode and continue to use the application.

Note: If the watch is TicWear, please go to Settings - Privilege Management - FileServer and set the Mobile Data Privilege to "Opened".
 Network Requirements: Watches need to be connected to WIFI and connected to the same LAN as PCs or mobile phones. 
 Content Loading: For the first time, it may be slower to open the web page. Please wait patiently. If there is no response, please check whether the connected network and the inputted address are correct.

①Consent authority
 ②If the watch is TicWear, please go to Settings - Privilege Management - FileServer and set the Mobile Data Privilege to "Opened".
 ③On the home page, click on the switch next to the file service to start the service.
 ④Enter the displayed IP address in the browser address bar, or use the mobile phone to scan the QR-Code to open the web address.
 ⑤When not in use, click on the switch next to the file service to close the service and save electricity.
 ⑥After the end of use, slide to the right and end the application process.
If the watch is TicWear, please go to Settings-Privilege Management-FileServer and set the mobile data privilege to \"Opened\".
